title: White Witch, Black Curse
description: Kick-ass bounty hunter and witch Rachel Morgan has crossed forbidden lines, taken demonic hits, and still stands. But the death of her lover struck her harder than she ever thought possible. She won't rest until his murder is solved . . . and avenged.But a new predator is moving to the apex of the Inderlander food chainâ€”and now Rachel's past is coming back to haunt her. Literally.
author: Kim Harrison
